documents.document:
To Get To Know you

LAST PERSON WHO...
1. Slept in a bed beside you?
2. Saw you cry?
3. Went to the movies with you?
4. You went to the mall with?
5. You went to dinner with?
6. You talked on the phone?
7. Said 'I love you' to you and really meant it?
8. Broke your heart?
9. Made you laugh?
WOULD YOU RATHER?
1. Pierce your nose or tongue?
2. Be serious or be funny?
3. Drink whole or skim milk?
4. Die in a fire or drown?
5. Spend time with your parents or enemies?
ARE YOU..
1. Simple or complicated?
DO YOU PREFER. .
1. Flowers or candy?
2. Grey or black?
3. Color or Black and white photos?
4. Lust or love?
5. Sunrise or sunset?
6. M&Ms or Skittles?
8. Staying up late or waking up early?
ANSWER TRUTHFULLY !!
1. Do you like anyone?
2. Do they know it?
DO YOU PREFER...
1. Sun or moon?
2. Winter or Fall?
3. Left or right?
4. 10 acquaintances or having two best friends?
5. Sun or rain?
6. Vanilla ice cream or chocolate ice cream?
7. Vodka or Jack?
ABOUT YOU!
1. What time is it ?
2. Name?
3. Nicknames-
4. Where were you born?
5. What is your birthdate?
6. What do you want?
7. Where do you want to live?
8. How many kids do you want?
9. what would you want to name the girl?
10. What would you want to name a boy?
11. You want to get married?
UNIQUE!
1. Nervous Habits?
2. Are you double jointed?
3. Can you roll your tongue?
4. Can you raise one eyebrow?
5. Can you cross your eyes?
6. Do you make your bed daily?
8. Which shoe goes on first?
9. Ever thrown one at someone?
10. On the average, how much money do you carry on you?
11. What jewelry do you wear?
12. Do you twirl your spaghetti or cut it?
13.Have you ever eaten Spam?
14. Favorite ice cream?
15. How many kinds cereal are in your cabinet?
16. What's your favorite beverage?
17. Do you cook?
IN THE LAST MONTH, HAVE YOU?
1. Had a b/f or g/f?
2. Bought something you didn't need?
4. Sang in front of people?
5. Been kissed?
6. Been hugged?
7.did something stupid?
8. Missed someone?
9. Got drunk?
10. Got high?
11. Danced Crazy?
12. Gotten your hair cut?
13. Cried?
14. Lied?

Grade Me <3

F = damn you're ugly

D = your parents must be hated

C- = You're just someone I don't want to talk to, okay?

C = You're okay looking, but u need work...

C+ = You're just average

B- = Your kinda cute and ur cool i guess

B = You're cute. And you're a pretty interesting person.

B+ = Pretty damn attractive. I'd hit that.

A- = You're extremely attractive, and you're awesome.

A = DANG YOUR SEXXXY!!

A+ = ... will u go out with me seriously

A++= wanna be my wifey/hubby(will you marry me

14 easy questions

1. Who are you?

2. Are we friends?

3. When and how did we meet?

4. Would you ever kiss me?

5. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it.

6. Describe me in one word.

7. What was your first impression of me?

8. Do you still think that way about me now?

9. What reminds you of me?

10. If you could give me anything what would it be?

11. How well do you know me?

12. When was the last time you saw me?

13. Ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't?

14. Are you going to post this in your notes and see what I say about you?

Life Soundtrack

IF YOUR LIFE WAS A MOVIE, WHAT WOULD THE SOUNDTRACK BE?

So, here's how it works:
1. Open your library (iTunes, Winamp, Media Player, iPod, etc)
2. Put it on shuffle
3. Press play
4. For every question, type the song that's playing
5. When you go to a new question, press the next button

Opening Credits:

Waking Up:

First Day At School:

Falling In Love:

Fight Song:

Breaking Up:

Prom:

Life's OK:

Mental Breakdown:

Driving:

Flashback:

Getting Back Together:

Wedding:

Birth of Child:

Final Battle:

Death Scene:

Funeral Song:

End Credits:

Texxt me <3

Number:___________________
Best time to text:__________________

I dare you to copy and paste this and see how many numbers you get.

xx

? would you ?

Would you love me for me

Would would try to change me

Would you kiss me in public

Would you let me kiss you for no reason

Would you come over just to hang out

Would you let me sleep with you

Would you sleep with me

Would you??

Poem

Sorry, im not perfect
and cannot detect
my emotions as they appear.
I wish i could disappear,
never to hurt anyone again.
Tears stain,
my tired eyes.
I ask myself why

Lost with nowhere to go
self-esteem kept way too low.
for now the shadows
guard my weary soul.

The pain's too much to bare
my heart cannot take much more wear.
This is the cry of a torn heart.

Despair, misery and lonliness
are the emotions i confess
that run my life.

Another poem

I lay awake,
with many desicions to make,
unable to sleep
trying not to weep.

I don't shed a single tear,
for fear someone will hear.
These thoughts are binding my mind,
which are ones I cannot unwind.

Now a days I'm always on edge,
for I fear someone will shove me off the ledge
and I'll slowly fall into the dark abyss,
into emotions i cannot supress.

My story is unfinished
already longer than most
filled with drama and sorrow,
I cannot escape the shadow
to find my true identity
I'll be searching for all eternity.

Bet you wont give it to me

Bet you won't give it to me.
Name:___________________Number:_________- - __________- - - - - - - - - - - - - - Best time to call:__________________ - - - -Best time to text:_________________I dare you to copy and paste this and see how many numbers you get......

Sweet Surrender...

Tears silently steam down my face
each tear meant to replace
the words i cannot say
for i do not wish to stay in this cruel world anymore

My eyes now red and swollen
do not come close in comparison to my broken
heart which is now in a million shreds
and it fills me with dread to think
it will never be complete again

Bang! goes the gun i mentally
hold to my head wishing it was really
there so i might have a chance to finalize
this never ending nightmare until i realize
that this will be my sweet surrender
until im gone forever
